## **Exploratory Data Analysis**

### Tokenization and Cleaning

```{r}
## Import and clean the data with quanteda
apple <- read.csv(here::here("data/Apple.csv"))
apple.cp <- corpus(apple$Reviews)
apple.tk <- tokens(apple.cp,
                   remove_numbers = T,
                   remove_punct = T,
                   remove_symbols = T,
                   remove_separators = T)
apple.tk <- apple.tk %>% 
  tokens_tolower() %>% 
  tokens_remove(stop_words$word) 

## Compute the DTM, TF-IDF and global frequencies
apple.dfm <- dfm(apple.tk)
apple.tfidf <- dfm_tfidf(apple.dfm)
apple.freq <- textstat_frequency(apple.dfm)
```
